title: Academic Mission
content: I am an Industry Assistant Professor at NYU Tandon School of Engineering specializing in cybersecurity and responsible AI. With 20+ years in technology and entrepreneurship, I have led RocketHub to a successful acquisition and helped launch deep-tech ventures. I focus on applied security research that addresses real-world challenges in hardware security, AI ethics, and governance of emerging technologies.

title: Education & Credentials
content: M.S. in Computer Science & Cybersecurity — NYU Tandon School of Engineering|M.S. in Negotiation & Conflict Resolution — Columbia University, Earth Institute|B.A. in Economics & Chinese — Hamilton College

title: Research & Teaching
content: I teach graduate courses in cybersecurity and computer networking, mentor students through the OSIRIS Lab, and conduct research examining how technical systems interact with human decision-making and governance structures. My interdisciplinary work combines technical expertise with conflict resolution methodologies to address AI alignment challenges and develop frameworks for responsible AI deployment.

title: Teaching Philosophy
content: Classes are project-driven and interdisciplinary, bridging theory with real-world cybersecurity challenges. Security education must be experiential and hands-on. Students learn best by breaking systems, building defenses, and understanding the socio-technical context in which technology operates.

title: Career Highlights
content: RocketHub (Co-founder/CFO): Launched 8,000+ campaigns raising over $50M for entrepreneurs. Led the company to a successful acquisition in 2015.|Stacked Capital (Managing Partner): Early-stage tech fund investing in deep-tech ventures focusing on hardware security, AI infrastructure, and critical systems resilience.|Congressional Expert Testimony: Testified before U.S. Congress on the JOBS Act, advising on crowdfunding regulation and financial innovation policy.

title: Policy & Regulatory Work
content: Expert testimony before U.S. House committees on startup funding and the JOBS Act. Co-authored whitepapers on crowdfunding regulation submitted to Congress, SEC, and FINRA. This domain authority combines technical expertise with regulatory policy development.

title: Consulting & Advisory
content: Available for strategic consulting on security architecture, threat modeling, applied cryptography, AI governance, and building security-conscious engineering cultures. Experience spans early-stage ventures, enterprise clients, and government advisory roles.
